dn30:1.6.7: anvabhi → anubhi (cck); annubhi (sya1ed, sya2ed); ānubhi (pts-vp-pli1ed); aṃnubhi (ṭīkā)
dn30:1.12.4: Tena sucaritena saggamagamā → tena so sucaritena saggamagamāsi (sya-all)
dn30:1.15.10: Yaṃ gihissapi → na taṃ gihissapi (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn30:1.18.3: Piyavāditañca samānattatañca → piyavadatañca samānachandatañca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); piyavadatañca samānachandañca (sya-all)
dn30:1.19.1: pubbe manussabhūto samāno → samāno bahuno janassa (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn30:1.30.12: Pasayha sahidha sattaratanaṃ → pasayha sa hi ca sattaratanaṃ (bj); pasayha abhivasana-varataraṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn30:1.33.5: Samaṅgikatvā → samaggi katvā ca (sya-all); samaggiṃ katvā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn30:2.3.6: Mahiñca pana ṭhito → sa hi ca pana ṭhito (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); samā ca panaṭṭhito (sya-all)
dn30:2.6.9: Atthassa middhī ca → idaṃ samiddhañca (bj, mr); addhaṃ samiddhañca (sya-all)
dn30:2.10.2: na ca visāci → na ca visācitaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); na ca visāvi (sya-all)
dn30:2.27.2: samphappalāpaṃ na muddhataṃ → na samphappalāpaṃ na vuccaddhatanti (sya-all); samphappalāpaṃ na abuddhatanti (mr)
dn30:2.31.13: Samamapi sucisusukkaṃ → suci ca suvisuddhasusukkaṃ. (sya-all); suvisuddhaṃ suvisukkaṃ. (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn30:2.31.25: Imamapi ca paramapi ca → paraṃpi paramaṃpi ca (sya-all); imampi ca parampi ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
